main.title: Nomad Club online shop
main.earnPointsEnterYourCard: To earn points for a purchase, enter your card number
main.whereFindCardNumber: Where can I find the card number?
main.findCardNumberText: On the front of your credit or debit card. The number is usually located at the bottom of the card and consists of 16 digits
